description: short sword with horn hilt; metal dog's head at top of hilt; stag's head and foliage on metal pendant at bottom of hilt; top of blade carved with scrolls and winged figure on both sides of blade; leather strap with hook and buckle separate from sword
dimension: L.22-1/8 x W.2-1/2 x D.1-1/2 in. (sword, overall)
title: Short Sword
